articles.title: Jenny Slate And Kristen Bell Will Stop Playing Biracial Cartoon Characters - NPR
articles.description: The white actors will no longer play characters on Big Mouth and Central Park. Instead, they ask that Black voice actors be cast. Nick Kroll, co-creator of Big Mouth, apologized and agrees.
articles.content:
On Big Mouth, Jenny Slate played Missy Foreman-Greenwald, right.
Netflix
America's reckoning on race has come to TV animation, as stars Jenny Slate and Kristen Bell, who are white, have agreed to s… [+2762 chars]

articles.title: 'Gone with the Wind' returns to HBO Max ... with a disclaimer - CNN
articles.description: Rhett and Scarlett are back on HBO Max, along with some criticism of slavery and race relations in the South that was missing from "Gone with the Wind."
